oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A THREEDIMENSIONAL MODEL OF A HOMOGENEOUS ESTUARY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sundermann, Jurgen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: estuary
homogeneous estuary
three dimensional model
estuary model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Basing on HANSEN's hydrodynamical-numerical method a threedimensional model of wind and tidally generated processes in a homogeneous estuary is developed. The model includes an arbitrary depth distribution and the simulation of a boundary layer near the bottom. Some numerical examples demonstrate the applicability for practical purposes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 14 (1974): Proceedings of 14th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1974.; 136
